name: gurps-gm-familiar
description: A GM assistant for GURPS games.

scripts.test: jshint lib test index.js && mocha -R spec --recursive
scripts.build: mkdir build; browserify lib/views/web/js/app.js -o build/app.js && node-sass lib/views/web/css/style.scss --include-path bower_components -o build && cp -r lib/views/web/html/* build
